homeSection.subtitle: I'm InyerM
homeSection.description: I'm a <0>Fullstack Developer</0>. I'm passionate about technology and I love to learn new things. I'm currently working as a NestJs at <1>Inlaze</1>.

projectsSection.title: Projects
projectsSection.subtitle: Here are some of my projects

description.inyerm-shop: A simple e-commerce app made with NextJs, React, Stripe and more, based on tesla shop website. It's still in development.
description.finanz-app: A financial app made with NextJs and others technologies. There are some features like a budget calculator, and manage your expenses and incomes.
description.open-jira: Project made for practicing with NextJs and Server side rendering. It's a simple Jira clone with limited functions.
description.pokemon-static: This is a simple project made for practicing with NextJs and static site generation. It's a simple pokemon app with a list of pokemons and a detail page.
description.rick-and-morty: Project made with Svelte and SvleteKit. It's a simple app with a list of characters from Rick and Morty and a detail page.
description.xkcs-comics-app: NextJs app with a list of comics from XKCD and a detail page. It's a simple project made for practicing with NextJs and Server side rendering.
